tags.name: Configs
tags.description: Endpoints for managing Logto configuration settings.

get.description: Get the configuration settings for the admin console.

patch.description: Update the configuration settings for the admin console.

200.description: Admin console configuration settings after update.

get.description: Get Logto OIDC private keys by key type from database. The actual key will be redacted from the result.

200.description: List of Logto OIDC private keys.

delete.description: Delete a Logto OIDC private key by Logto OIDC key type and key ID.

422.description: Logto OIDC key required for operation.

post.description:
Rotate Logto OIDC private keys. A new key will be generated and added to the list of private keys.
Logto only keeps the last 2 recent keys. The oldest key will be automatically removed if the list exceeds 2 keys.

signingKeyAlgorithm.description:
The signing key algorithm the new generated private key is using.
Only applicable to `oidc.privateKeys`.

200.description: List of rotated Logto OIDC private keys.

422.description: Invalid operation or Logto OIDC key not found.
